name: Element Capital Partners LLP
goal: The firm is engaged in the business of portfolio management and ancillary activities.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade
euInitiatives: Follow and understand EU policies and events in the context of our professional activities including, by way of example, the Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID), the Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive (AIFMD) and economic policies and economic/trade related decisions of the European Central Bank and other EU institutions.
